awd_titl_txt: Mathematical Sciences: Cooperative and Stochastic Games
awd_abstract_narration: This project will consider cooperative and stochastic games.               For cooperative games, questions related to Shapley value will be               analyzed when the players are assumed to join coalitions with                   varying levels of effort or sincerity.  In addition, the notion                 of potential function for this kind of games will be considered.                For stochastic games, the existence of efficient algorithms and                 equilibria will be studied.                                                          Models developed in this project apply to a many                           phenomena in areas such as economics, finance, social and                       military science.  Due to the generality of the methods a vast                  area of knowledge is to benefit from the results of this grant.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Mathematical and Physical Sciences
